title: News reports from France. [No. 71/65] = Chroniques de France

description: Cinemagazine items:  1. Bread of French tradition - Breadmaking process from wheat harvest to baking in France. 2. Discovering science - Palais de la Decouverte in Paris. 3. Chamonix Mountain Guides - The conquest of the world famous Chamonix Mountain created a need for a new rqce of mountaineers to guide inexperienced climbers. 4. Iannis Xenakis - A brilliant modern composer and musician.
